item.title: S&P 500 指数需要利润增长或美联储减息来证明高位的合理性
item.description: 在历史上，美国股市很少像 2025 年那样遭遇如此多的阻力：新总统重新调整全球秩序、全面征收关税以及中东冲突带来的不确定性。但股市仍然逆势上扬，距离历史高点仅有一线之隔。【原文：Few times in history has the US market grappled with as many headwinds as it’s faced in 2025: a new president rejiggering the global order, sweeping tariffs and a bout of uncertainty stemming from conflict in the Middle East. Stocks have still prevailed against all odds and sit just a whisker away from all-time highs.】

item.title: 法国电力价格因高温导致核电削减的警告而上涨
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）警告说，由于天气炎热，6 月底可能会削减核电产量，而制冷需求的增加又会使电力供应紧张，因此法国本月电力价格上涨。【原文：French month-ahead power prices rose after Electricite de France SA warned that nuclear output could be cut at the end of June because of scorching weather, just as increased cooling demand strains electricity supply.】

item.title: 安巴尼和阿达尼合作使用对方的燃料零售网络
item.description: 亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）和高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）联手利用各自集团在印度各地的零售站销售运输燃料。【原文：Billionaires Mukesh Ambani and Gautam Adani have joined hands to sell transportation fuels using their respective groups’ retail stations across India.】

item.title: 欧元涨势面临拐点，逼近 1.20 美元
item.description: 欧元最近的涨势正接近一个关键水平，它可能会阻滞欧元的上涨势头，也可能会释放欧元向 1.20 美元迈进的下一步动力。【原文：The euro’s latest rally is approaching a pivotal level that could either stall its momentum or unlock the next leg toward $1.20, a target strategists and traders have circled for months.】

item.title: 瑞士认为如果仍在谈判中，美国将在 7 月 9 日后继续征收 10%的关税
item.description: 瑞士政府预计，在 7 月 9 日 90 天宽限期结束后，只要两国之间的谈判继续进行，美国的关税仍将保持目前 10%的税率。【原文：The Swiss government expects US tariffs to remain at the current rate of 10% after the 90-day grace period ends on July 9, as long as negotiations between the two countries continue.】

item.title: 葡萄牙重申将在 2025 年实现国防开支目标
item.description: 葡萄牙总理路易斯-黑山重申，葡萄牙将在 2025 年实现国防投资占国内生产总值 2% 的目标，同时坚持财政纪律。【原文：Portuguese Prime Minister Luis Montenegro reiterated his country will reach a target for investment in defense to increase to 2% of gross domestic product in 2025, while sticking to fiscal discipline.】

item.title: 印度私营炼油厂主导俄罗斯主要等级石油的采购
item.description: 今年迄今为止，印度已从俄罗斯海运出口的旗舰石油等级中获得了 80% 的份额，该国仅有的两家私营炼油厂还在不断攫取更多的低价原油。【原文：India has taken 80% of Russian seaborne exports of its flagship oil grade so far this year, with the country’s only two private refineries scooping up a growing portion of the cut-price crude.】

item.title: BBVA 的最新挫折让分析师对萨瓦德尔交易意见不一
item.description: 西班牙决定推迟 BBVA SA 与萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）可能进行的合并，这使得分析师们对该交易是否仍将继续进行产生了分歧。【原文：Spain’s decision to delay a possible merger of BBVA SA with Banco Sabadell SA is leaving analysts divided over whether the deal will still go ahead.】

item.title: 沙特石油出口收入降至近四年来最低点
item.description: 由于原油价格暴跌，沙特阿拉伯 4 月份的石油出口收入降至近四年来的最低点。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s revenue from oil exports slumped to the lowest in almost four years in April as crude prices crashed.】

item.title: 瑞士在新会谈中寻求与欧盟开展防务合作
item.description: 瑞士希望就与欧盟建立防务伙伴关系展开探索性会谈，因为对美国从欧洲大陆撤退的担忧促使这个传统上保持中立的国家重新思考安全政策。【原文：Switzerland wants to start exploratory talks on a defense partnership with the European Union as worries about a US retreat from the continent prompt a rethink of security policy in the traditionally neutral country.】

item.title: Prosus 首席执行官 Bloisi 的目标是在未来三年将收入翻番
item.description: 技术投资商 Prosus NV 首席执行官 Fabricio Bloisi 在周三的资本市场日上表示，随着公司专注于建立大型电子商务平台，公司的目标是在未来三年内将收入翻一番。【原文：Technology investor Prosus NV targets to double its revenue over the next three years as the company focuses on building out large e-commerce platforms, Chief Executive Officer Fabricio Bloisi said during its capital markets day on Wednesday.】

item.title: 高盛交易员认为低质量股票风险叠加
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：As stocks push toward all-time highs and a fear of missing out on the rally spreads among investors, a senior Goldman Sachs Group Inc. trader warned that there are valid reasons to meet the latest gains with caution.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉资本、T&D 被指将成为亿万富豪李书福旗下 FWD 首次公开募股的基石投资者
item.description: 据知情人士透露，穆巴达拉资本（Mubadala Capital）和日本T&D控股公司（T&D Holdings Inc.【原文：Mubadala Capital and Japan’s T&D Holdings Inc. are set to be cornerstone investors in insurer FWD Group Holdings Ltd.’s initial public offering in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度央行的现金举措旨在降低短期借贷成本
item.description: 分析人士认为，印度央行决定从金融体系中抽走流动性，可能是为了防止隔夜借贷成本进一步下降。【原文：The Indian central bank’s decision to drain liquidity from the financial system is likely intended to prevent a further decline in overnight borrowing costs, according to analysts.】

item.title: 新加坡计划在未来十年新建 80,000 套住宅
item.description: 新加坡计划在未来 10 到 15 年内建造至少 8 万套公共和私人住宅，这是政府为满足日益增长的经济适用房需求而做出的最新努力的一部分。【原文：Singapore is planning to build at least 80,000 public and private homes over the next 10 to 15 years, as part of the government’s latest effort to meet rising demand for affordable housing.】

item.title: 被制裁的液化天然气船驶向供应欧洲的俄罗斯工厂
item.description: 一艘受制裁的液化天然气油轮似乎正驶向俄罗斯的一处设施，此举将对西方当局构成挑战，因为西方当局迄今一直避免对该出口工厂施加限制。【原文：A sanctioned liquefied natural gas tanker appears to be heading toward a Russian facility, a move that would challenge Western authorities who have so far avoided imposing restrictions on the export plant.】

item.title: 星展集团计划为北亚市场招聘40名私人银行家
item.description: 新加坡最大的贷款机构星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）计划今年在香港和新加坡招聘约 40 名私人银行家，以满足北亚富裕客户的需求。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd., Singapore’s largest lender, is targeting hiring about 40 private bankers this year in Hong Kong and Singapore to cater to wealthy clients in North Asia.】

item.title: 沙特法国银行向亚洲银行提供 7.5 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯银行沙特法国银行正在寻求一笔 7.5 亿美元的贷款，目标是亚洲的银行，因为该银行希望在国内市场之外实现筹资多元化。【原文：Saudi Arabian bank Banque Saudi Fransi is seeking a $750 million loan, targeting banks in Asia as it looks to diversify fundraising beyond its domestic market, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度股票监管机构从 NSE 获得创纪录的结算报价
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度国家证券交易所有限公司已向监管机构申请通过支付近 140 亿卢比（约合 1.63 亿美元）的创纪录金额来解决一起法律纠纷，从而有可能消除其公开上市的一个关键障碍。【原文：The National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. has applied to the regulator to settle a legal dispute by paying a record amount of nearly 14 billion rupees ($163 million), according to people familiar with the matter, potentially removing a key hurdle toward its public listing.】

item.title: 非洲新增水电装机容量翻番，但资金风险依然存在
item.description: 去年，非洲新增水电装机容量翻了一番，利用该技术发电的装机容量增加了 4.5 千兆瓦，尽管资金方面的挑战限制了更快的增长。【原文：Africa doubled new hydropower capacity last year, adding 4.5 gigawatts of generation from the technology even as funding challenges limit faster growth.】

item.title: 沙特医院运营商首次公开募股失败，股价下跌
item.description: 总部位于沙特阿拉伯的 Specialized Medical Co. 公司在利雅得首次上市交易中股价下跌，标志着该公司在沙特的上市交易再次陷入低迷。【原文：Saudi Arabia-based Specialized Medical Co.’s stock fell in its Riyadh trading debut, marking another muted listing in the kingdom.】

item.title: 德国 PBB 重拾次级债券以取代旧债
item.description: 德国商业地产贷款机构 Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG 将出售七年来的首笔次级债券，为回购部分旧次级债提供资金。【原文：German commercial property lender Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG is selling its first subordinated bond in seven years to fund the buyback of some of its old junior debt.】

item.title: 政治不确定性增加风险，泰国维持关键利率不变
item.description: 泰国国内的政治不确定性加剧了从美国关税到中东冲突等全球风险，泰国央行维持主要利率不变，保留了有限的政策空间。【原文：The Bank of Thailand held its key interest rate unchanged, saving its limited policy space as political uncertainty at home compounds global risks ranging from US tariffs to the conflict in the Middle East.】

item.title: 拜登官员称中国对美不占优势
item.description: 美国前副国务卿库尔特-坎贝尔（Kurt Campbell）说，美国需要 "一代人的时间 "才能使稀土和全球供应链中其他部分对中国的依赖多样化，但这并不意味着北京在经济上比华盛顿占上风。【原文：It will take “a generation” to diversify some of the US dependency on China for rare earths and other pieces of global supply chains, but that doesn’t mean Beijing holds the economic upper hand over Washington, former US Deputy Secretary of State Kurt Campbell said.】

item.title: 电动汽车价格战持续，CATL 优先考虑海外扩张
item.description: 全球最大的电动汽车电池制造商当代安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.全球最大的电动汽车电池制造商安培瑞斯科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co., Ltd.）首席制造官倪军称，由于中国国内汽车市场的激烈竞争威胁到该行业的健康发展，该公司正将海外扩张作为 "第一要务"。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd., the world’s largest electric vehicle battery maker, is making overseas expansion its “No. 1 priority” as intense competition in China’s domestic car market threatens the industry’s health, according to Chief Manufacturing Officer Ni Jun.】

item.title: 英国大亨索特的家族办公室在全球紧张局势中寻求交易
item.description: 布赖恩-索特（Brian Souter）是世界上最大的运输业巨头之一，他的投资公司计划继续进行交易，即使在全球市场波动加剧的情况下，其他基金经理也会抑制风险投资。【原文：An investment firm for Brian Souter, who built one of the world’s biggest transport fortunes, plans to keep striking deals even as other money managers curb risk-taking amid heightened volatility in global markets.】

item.title: 尤文图斯俱乐部的加密货币投资者已转为激进分子，并希望获得董事会席位
item.description: 情人节当天，总部位于萨尔瓦多的加密货币公司 Tether 宣布成为意大利最杰出的足球俱乐部之一尤文图斯的投资者。四个月后，双方的关系并不顺利。【原文：On Valentine’s Day, El Salvador-based crypto firm Tether announced it has become an investor in Juventus, one of Italy’s most distinguished football clubs. Four months later, the relationship is not going well.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将连续第二天落后于欧洲股市涨势
欧盟希望中国在七月峰会前解决稀土问题
item.description: 欧盟驻北京最高特使表示，欧盟希望中国在下个月的领导人会议之前解决目前稀土磁铁短缺的问题。【原文：The European Union wants China to resolve the current shortage of rare earth magnets before a meeting of their leaders next month, according to the bloc’s top envoy to Beijing.】

item.title: 卡塔尔关联私人银行将拓展贝莱德财富管理服务
item.description: 由卡塔尔统治家族成员控制的欧洲最大的纯银行之一，正在扩大与贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：One of Europe’s largest pure-play banks, which is controlled by members of Qatar’s ruling family, is expanding a partnership with BlackRock Inc. to bolster its investing services.】
